column1: Uchi////So this was a quick (not really) impromptu early birthday dinner for sister before she headed back to NYC. I will say that it was short notice so I did not make reservations
column3: faux pas indeed. ALWAYS MAKE A RESERVATION. We waited just about 1 1/2 hours for a 4-top. Sister was almost livid. :( I repeatedly assured her it would be worth it. And oh was it. Honestly
column4: by the time we were seated we were eyeing the 10 course chef tasting. Go big or go home right? Yes
column8: understood the pain. He actually offered to do a 10 course for us that would be a little cheaper than the set menu price. Yes
